reviewText: Not quite sure why, but extensive parts of DA's work are not available for region 1, and not listed on Amazon-US.  Just coincidently, most of the missing works dig deeply into the factual basis of evolution.  So, get it from Amazon-UK.  If you bundle it, the shipping is not all that much.  While you're at it, check out some of the other Brit natural history programming;  DA, while the master, doesn't do much geology, and there are other series that do, and are very good.
